titleInfo.title: NASCAR 100-mile race at the Nashville Fairgrounds Speedway, 1958 August 10

mods.identifier: Banner NASCAR 100 mile race Fairgrounds Aug10 1958 - 2328 012

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A view of the NASCAR 100-mile race at the Fairgrounds Speedway on August 10th, 1958. This was when the Grand National series came to the Nashville Fairgroundsâ€™ half-mile asphalt oval. Rex White grabbed the pole in the 200-lap race but ended up with a 23rd place finish after a right front wheel break while leading in lap 162. The race was won by Joe Weatherly in a 1958 H-M Ford and he collected $1850 for his winnings. Second place went to Bob Welborn. The event was attended by a big crowd of nearly 14,000. Forms part of Nashville Banner Negatives Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
